Package team

Class PlayerTeam

java.lang.Object
team.Team
team.PlayerTeam
public class PlayerTeam extends Team
this class implements the PlayerTeam which is extends the Team class, it defines the functionality of the players team

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    PlayerTeam(int money, String name)
    a PlayerTeam constructor sets name, money, and points
    PlayerTeam(String name)
    the default PlayerTeam constructor sets name, money, and points money and points are set to a default value of 100 and 0 respectively

      a PlayerTeam constructor sets name, money, and points
      Parameters:
      name - the new team name
      money - the amount of money the player starts with

    • subtractMoney

      public void subtractMoney(int subtractAmount) throws InsufficientBalanceException
      subtracts the players money buy a certain amount, if the players money drops below 0 it throws and exception
      Parameters:
      subtractAmount - the amount to subtract from the players money
      Throws:
      InsufficientBalanceException - indicates an insufficient balance

    • rechargeStamina

      public void rechargeStamina()
      resets the stamina of each athlete in the players team, including none active team members

    • canContinue

      public boolean canContinue()
      checks if the player is able to continue playing the game. if the player does not have four non injured athletes then return false, else return true
      Returns:
      a boolean based on whether the player's team can continue

    • removeTeamMember

      public void removeTeamMember(int index)
      removes a team member from the players team based on an index value
      Parameters:
      index - the index of the athlete in the team member list

    • setSpeakerPosition

      public void setSpeakerPosition(int selectedPositionNumber, Athlete selectedAthlete)
      sets a given speaker position to a given athlete
      Parameters:
      selectedPositionNumber - the selected speaker position
      selectedAthlete - the selected athlete

    • isFullSpeakers

      public boolean isFullSpeakers()
      checks if all of the speaker positions are filled, returns true if so and false if not
      Returns:
      a boolean indicated whether all of the speaker positions are filled

    • isAbleToPlay

      public boolean isAbleToPlay()
      checks if the team is able to play a match by checking if any athletes are injured, returns true if not and false if so
      Returns:
      a boolean indicating whether or not the team is able to play a match

    • getTeamMemberListAsArray

      public Athlete[] getTeamMemberListAsArray()
      returns the player teams list of team members as an array
      Returns:
      the array containing each of the player teams team members
